name: HSP_ACCT_OPERATIVE
description: This table contains operative component information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account containing related operative information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each operative information set  will have its own line number.

columns.name: OPER_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: Operative component note type associated with hospital account.  i.e. 1-dictated 2-progress note

columns.name: OPER_PHYSICIAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the operative physician associated with hospital account.

columns.name: OPER_DT
columns.description: Date of operation associated with hospital account.

columns.name: CRIT_MET_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores whether the criteria of the operation associated with the hospital account were met: 1-yes, 2-no, or 3-N/A.
